section.sectionText:
The Youth Employment Program is a non-profit organization building our next generations into outstanding leaders who productively support our local communities.

We depend on {bringing forth/developing} members and citizens {who/that} provide/deliver excellence through principled and learned skills to improve our societies.

We forge our stewards in the wilderness of the Rocky Mountains and the High Divide, and temper in the Missouri Headwaters.

feature.featureText: YEP is overflowing with great personalities and talent actively engaged in supporting the leadership of tomorrow's communities. We shine by polishing our workforce and ourselves through fun and hard work in the outdoors. We are compelled to forge lasting relationships and memories through work driven experiences and Technical Career Training
